bioconda.name: bioconductor-affyrnadegradation
bioconda.summary: Analyze and correct probe positional bias in microarray data due to RNA degradation

biotools.summary: The package helps with the assessment and correction of RNA degradation effects in Affymetrix 3' expression arrays. The parameter d gives a robust and accurate measure of RNA integrity. The correction removes the probe positional bias, and thus improves comparability of samples that are affected by RNA degradation.

bioschemas.name: AffyRNADegradation
bioschemas.summary: The package helps with the assessment and correction of RNA degradation effects in Affymetrix 3' expression arrays.
